alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Western Alachua; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 8:27AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gilchrist, Alachua, northwestern Marion and south central Columbia Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 827 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near University Of Florida to Archer to near Andrews. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Trenton, Bell, Fort McCoy, Citra, Alachua, High Springs, Hawthorne, Archer and University Of Florida. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Western Alachua; Western Marion
